revision.comment: (bot) add rhyme syllable count obtained from Rhymes: pages
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{suffix|en|year|ed}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{rhymes|en|ɪə(ɹ)d|s=1}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # {{lb|en|in combination}} Of a specified number of [[year]]s. # {{lb|en|poetic}} That has lasted many years; [[old]]. #* '''1982''', {{w|Lawrence Durrell}}, ''Constance'', Faber & Faber 2004 (''Avignon Quintet''), p. 701: #*: Ironically, too, the wine was a '''yeared''' Bollinger of almost carnal subtlety and while Sutcliffe's stomach quailed his palate hungered for the treat.
